My name is José Roberto Chávez Cobián . I am a developer currently located in Guadalajara, México. I am passionate about my job and want to continue learning and growing at it.

I gratuated from the University of Colima as a Software Engineer. Currently working as a web developer.

I've created this site as a personal project using what I've learn as a web developer. It will be continue growing full other side-projects along the way.

I was born in Cd. Guzmán, Jalisco. A small city contained within a valley of mountains and a couple of volcanoes.
